titleStmt.title: The royall missive to the Prince of VVales, being the letter of K. Charles I. : in part metrically paraphrased, for essay vnto the rest / by Ri. VVatson.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Richard, 1612-1685.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: Copy at reel 2972:7b bound and filmed following: "The royall votarie laying dovvne svvord and shield, to take up prayer and patience, the devout practice, of His sacred Maiesty K. Charles I. in his solitudes & sufferings" (Wing W1094A, 2972:7a).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
